life_date: Katsushika Hokusai, Japanese, 1760–1849; Nishimuraya Yohachi, Publisher, Japanese
markings: censor seal: 極 {kiwame}; publisher seal: 永寿堂 {Eijudō}
medium: Woodblock print (aizuri-e), ink and color on paper
portfolio: Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji (Fuji sanjūrokkei 富嶽三十六景)
signed: 前北斎為一筆 {Saki no Hokusai Iitsu hitsu}
title: Mishima Pass in Kai Province
